formatDescription: Every MySQL table is represented on disk by a .frm file that describes the table's format (that is, the table definition). The file bears the same name as the table, with an .frm extension.
provenanceCompoundName: Artefactual Systems Inc / Artefactual Systems Inc

internalSignatures.name: MySQL FRM
internalSignatures.note: BOF signature derived from format description, based upon bytes that are constant: http://dev.mysql.com/doc/internals/en/frm-file-format.html
